Element.name: IntermediateCatchingLinkEvent
Element.Description: A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/Events/LinkEvents/IntermediateCatchingLinkEvent"/> is a mechanism for connecting two sections of a Process. Link Events can be used to create looping situations or to avoid long Sequence Flow lines
Element.Action: Convert this event into a different catching event.
Convert this event into a different throwing event.
